Parameter Details: variable: Store element text in variable; position: Click position enum (TOP_LEFT, TOP_CENTER, TOP_RIGHT, CENTER_LEFT, CENTER, CENTER_RIGHT, BOTTOM_LEFT, BOTTOM_CENTER, BOTTOM_RIGHT); element-type: Type of element (BUTTON, LINK, etc.)
Notes: Three variations based on parameters used
Uses MOUSE action with DOUBLE_CLICK meta
Uses MOUSE action with RIGHT_CLICK meta

Parameter Details: position: Hover position enum (default: CENTER); duration: Hover duration in milliseconds
Notes: Uses MOUSE action with OVER meta; duration not currently used in client

Parameter Details: variable: Use variable value for text; clear: Clear field before writing; delay: Delay between keystrokes in ms
Notes: Two variations; clear and delay flags not currently used in client

Parameter Details: target: Target element selector; modifiers: Key modifiers array (ctrl, shift, alt, meta); repeat: Number of times to press key
Notes: Four variations based on target and modifiers
